summary: This is an email chain from July-August 2019 between FBI New York and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) regarding the case US v. Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms the case has been indicted and is pending, and that victim notifications will be handled by the USAO.

events.title: USAO SDNY Email Regarding Epstein Indictment
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York sends an email to FBI New York confirming the Jeffrey Epstein case has been indicted and is pending in federal court, and that victim notifications will be handled by the USAO.

locations: 1 St. Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The case US v. Jeffrey Epstein (Docket: 19-CR-00490) has been indicted by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY).
The case is pending in the Federal District Court for the Southern District of New York.
All victim notifications for the case will be sent out by the USAO SDNY.
The email references the Attorney General Guidelines regarding victim notifications.
The correspondence is between law enforcement (FBI) and prosecutors (USAO) regarding case administration.
